hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #flames in the royal tomb# reveal #the Boomerang#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that plundering #Kokiri Forest# is a foolish choice.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Slingshot# and #Epona's Song#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #a Piece of Heart# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the path of time.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the way of the hero.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #a Zora Tunic#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that a #storm near the castle# reveals a #generic grotto#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that an #invisible spinning blade# in the Shadow Temple guards...^ #a Deku Stick# and #Bombs (10 pieces)#.
